DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the optimal technique for determination of the renal function of critically ill patients.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Optimal Technique for Determination of Renal Function of Critically Ill Patients
DOC.criteria: Over 18 years old Intensive care patient Given informed consent Arterial infusion A bladder catheter Diurese < 400 mL/d
